items.kid_gloss: Water wears away rock over time.
items.hook_question: How does a river shape the land?
items.mini_task: Observe how water changes sand in a tray.

items.kid_gloss: Volcanoes can erupt with lots of force.
items.hook_question: What happens during a volcanic eruption?
items.mini_task: Make a baking soda volcano at home.

items.hook_question: How do rocks transform in nature?
items.mini_task: Collect different rocks and sort them.
